fi.jumi.actors

Class ActorRef<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.jumi.actors.ActorRef<T>

  • @ThreadSafe
public class ActorRef<T>
extends Object
    Handle for communicating with an actor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T tell()
      Used for sending asynchronous messages to an actor.
      static <T> ActorRef<T> wrap(T proxy)
      Can be used to wrap test doubles into ActorRefs for unit testing purposes.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • wrap

        public static <T> ActorRef<T> wrap(T proxy)
        Can be used to wrap test doubles into ActorRefs for unit testing purposes.

        Warning: Never use this method in production code! This method is meant to be used only by the Actors class.

      • tell

        public T tell()
        Used for sending asynchronous messages to an actor. The recommended usage pattern is actorRef.tell().theMessage(theParameters)

        To avoid confusion, the proxy returned from this method should never be stored in a variable or passed as a parameter to a method. Otherwise it can be hard to know that when you are holding the real actor object and when a proxy to it. Though that may sometimes be warranted when interacting with actor-unaware code or if you wish to avoid the dependency to ActorRef.
